name: Bitcamp Saga - Demo
description:
Bitcamp Saga Demo v0.0.0 - October 25th, 2020

Based out of newly commissioned recruit depot 42 Stumps, Senior Drill Instructor Gunny You, and your three Drill Instructors make a hilarious attempt at ensuring the success and well being of waves of future freedom fighters.

*  Gamepad/Joystick Compatible

Button A : Left CTRL

Button B: Left ALT

Button LB: Tab

Button RB: Backspace

Movement: Direction Keys

 Follow @bitcampsaga on Instagram!
